  • Pensioner’s dinner shock: Pams butter turns black with mould · 2025-10-29 · properly-fucked
    A Hastings pensioner discovered her recently purchased Pams butter was blackened with mould, despite a distant best-before date, raising concerns about product quality and prompting a wary approach to future purchases.
  • Auckland suburb loses Domino's Pizza · 2025-10-29 · properly-fucked
    Red Beach's Domino's Pizza has closed due to insufficient sales, leaving Inland Revenue and potentially other creditors unlikely to recover owed funds.
  • CGT debate turns personal as Hipkins says Luxon earned more from property than being PM · 2025-10-29 · lightly-fucked
    Labour leader Chris Hipkins reignited the capital gains tax debate by challenging Prime Minister Christopher Luxon over his untaxed property profits, amid renewed discussion on housing, equity, and election strategy.
  • Government and council impasse continues as 700 property owners wait · 2025-10-29 · lightly-fucked
    A standoff between Auckland Council and the Government has left about 700 property owners in limbo after a housing plan was withdrawn, with both sides blaming each other for the resulting legal and financial mess.
